Text: Capital gains tax (CGT) is charged at the rate of 10% on gains (including any held over gains coming into charge) where net total taxable gains and income is below the income tax basic rate band threshold.
Cause: net total taxable gains and income is below the income tax basic rate band threshold.
Effect: Capital gains tax (CGT) is charged at the rate of 10% on gains (including any held over gains coming into charge)
Sentence: <e2>Capital gains tax (CGT) is charged at the rate of 10% on gains (including any held over gains coming into charge)</e2> where <e1>net total taxable gains and income is below the income tax basic rate band threshold.</e1>
